005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
009
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.HashSet;
012import java.util.Set;
013import java.util.function.Function;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016
017/**
018 * This model walker can be used to gather metaschema definitions that are
019 * defined globally.
020 */
021public class UsedDefinitionModelWalker
022    extends DefinitionCollectingModelWalker {
023  private static final Function<IDefinition, Boolean> FILTER = (def) -> {
024    return true;
025    // return def.isGlobal();
026    // return def.isGlobal() || (def instanceof AssemblyDefinition &&
027    // ((AssemblyDefinition)def).getRootName() != null);
028  };
029
030  /**
031   * Get the collection of all definitions used directly and transitively by the
032   * provided definitions.
033   *
034   * @param definitions
035   *          a collection of definitions to generate used definitions from
036   * @return the collection of used definitions
037   */
038  @NonNull
039  public static Collection<? extends IDefinition>
040      collectUsedDefinitions(Collection<? extends IAssemblyDefinition> definitions) {
041    UsedDefinitionModelWalker walker = new UsedDefinitionModelWalker();
042    for (IAssemblyDefinition definition : definitions) {
043      assert definition != null;
044      walker.walk(definition);
045    }
046    return walker.getDefinitions();
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Collect the globally defined Metaschema definitions from the provided
051   * Metaschema modules, and any Metaschema modules imported directly or
052   * indirectly by these modules.
053   *
054   * @param modules
055   *          the Metaschema modules to analyze
056   * @return a collection of matching definitions
057   */
058  @NonNull
059  public static Collection<? extends IDefinition> collectUsedDefinitionsFromModule(
060      @NonNull Collection<? extends IModule> modules) {
061    Set<IAssemblyDefinition> definitions = new HashSet<>();
062    for (IModule module : modules) {
063      // get local roots in case they are scope=local
064      for (IAssemblyDefinition rootDef : module.getRootAssemblyDefinitions()) {
065        definitions.add(rootDef);
066      }
067
068      // get roots from exported
069      for (IAssemblyDefinition assembly : module.getExportedAssemblyDefinitions()) {
070        if (assembly.isRoot()) {
071          definitions.add(assembly);
072        }
073      }
074    }
075    return collectUsedDefinitions(definitions);
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Collect the globally defined Metaschema definitions from the provided
080   * Metaschema module, and any Metaschema modules imported directly or indirectly
081   * by this module.
082   *
083   * @param module
084   *          the metaschema module to analyze
085   * @return a collection of matching definitions
086   */
087  @NonNull
088  public static Collection<? extends IDefinition> collectUsedDefinitionsFromModule(
089      @NonNull IModule module) {
090    return collectUsedDefinitionsFromModule(CollectionUtil.singleton(module));
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Construct a new walker.
095   */
096  protected UsedDefinitionModelWalker() {
097    super(FILTER);
098  }
099}
